entry.RedBlue: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
entry.Yellow: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.
entry.Gold: If it fell from a great height, this POKéMON could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
entry.Silver: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
entry.Crystal: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.
entry.Ruby: SANDSHREW’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This POKéMON curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
entry.Sapphire: SANDSHREW has a very dry hide that is extremely tough. The POKéMON can roll into a ball that repels any attack. At night, it burrows into the desert sand to sleep.
entry.FireRed: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
entry.LeafGreen: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for prey.
entry.Emerald: When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
entry.HeartGold: If it fell from a great height, this Pokémon could save itself by rolling into a ball and bouncing.
entry.SoulSilver: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
entry.BlackWhite: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.
entry.Black 2White 2: It digs deep burrows to live in. When in danger, it rolls up its body to withstand attacks.
entry.X: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
entry.Y: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
entry.Omega Ruby: Sandshrew’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. This Pokémon curls up to protect itself from its enemies.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Sandshrew has a very dry hide that is extremely tough. The Pokémon can roll into a ball that repels any attack. At night, it burrows into the desert sand to sleep.
entry.Sun: It can roll its body into a ball. It moves through the desert by rolling at high speeds.
entry.Moon: It usually makes its home in deserts and arid zones, where rain does not fall. It digs holes to catch Bug-type Pokémon.
